resources.string: No translation engine has been selected!
Are you sure you want to delete this plugin? This operation is IRREVOCABLE.
You can choose at most %d engines to translate ay one time, but current is %d
Current task has been can celled!
I would be appreciated if you can give a star~

The honorary sponsors are all users who have sponsored FunnyTranslation for free before the launch of Pro. All users, regardless of the amount of sponsorship, can get a free 500-day VIP from the developer with the payment voucher. \n Thank you for your strong support at the beginning of the application, it will be remembered forever!
Please read and agree [Privacy Policy](https://api.funnysaltyfish.fun/trans/v1/api/privacy?locale=en) before using the application.

Permission is required to use the floating window. Please grant the corresponding permission correctly.
The floating ball can be dragged and moved to the designated position for deletion. 
Translate by tapping the bottom right corner of the floating window to directly open the application.
Drag the floating ball to a certain position and hold it for two seconds to trigger area screenshot translation. After selecting the area, you can jump to the translation.
Press and hold the floating ball to directly translate the current screen content.
It seems that nothing is here.\n Try to add a new plugin to explore more.

In text menu, open the floating window when jump to FunnyTranslation (the application itself needs to be opened for the first time, and can be used normally after being kept in the background. If there is no response, please try to manually open the floating window permission of the application)
Are you sure you want to delete all local history records? This operation is irreversible, please choose carefully

Picture translation function description: Image translation is based on a third-party engine. Due to its high cost, image translation is limited to login users, and the default quota of 10 points per person per month is reset on the 1st. The consumption of each translation is usually 1 point, and the other special points will be marked. \n\nYou need to grant permission to take pictures to use normally
All engines translate synchronously during translation, greatly improving translation speed.
You can only choose up to %d engines, upgrade to VIP to enjoy more
The current translation is in progress. Are you sure you want to quit?
No favorites yet,\nadd one by translating~
Due to cost reasons, image translation function needs to be logged in to use, please understand
To display more detailed translation results, such as phonetic symbols, parts of speech, examples, etc., the engine interface needs to support it (currently only supported by Youdao and Google).
When the home page of the application is opened from the background, the input state is automatically entered
The image is too large. Please try cropping it or using another engine.
Join QQ group to communicate with other users
Go to GitHub to view the project\'s source code
No history yet, do translating first
Other functions are under development, you can join the beta testing group
to get early access to new features
To use the float window function, you need to grant permission for the float window.
(Optional) Your contact information (such as qq xxx).

The application has crashed. We recommend that you take a screenshot and provide feedback in the translation test group (which can be found on the About page) or send a crash report (which may take longer to process). 

Why do we need a crash report? 
Application crashes are a major disaster for both users and developers, and we all hope to fix them. However, without an error message, a crash is like a broken black box that you only know is a problem, but not what the problem is, making it difficult to fix. Therefore, we hope you can provide symptoms so that we can prescribe the right medicine.
 
Specific reasons are as follows:
Failed to send error report. Please contact the developer to submit error information.
Page design & Bug report & Optimization suggestion
This feature requires Android 12 or higher!
Your membership will expire on %1$s, please renew in time

I\'m delighted to invite you to experience Transtation, a simple, ad-free, lightweight, and powerful open-source translation software. Both of us can get a membership by using my invite code [%1$s]. Come and download it for an amazing experience:\nhttps://www.funnysaltyfish.fun/trans
The language is currently set to automatic selection. Please manually specify the language.
The device seems to be on mute. Please adjust the volume.
The current reading has been stopped.
Enjoy triple the image translation points per month
Allow you select more engines at one time
Translating words is no longer just one result
Translate with all selected engines simultaneously, greatly improving translation speed
Highly customizable themes, define your own Transtation
Use engines exclusively available to members
Purchasing membership indicates that you have read and agreed to the [Transtation Membership Agreement](https://api.funnysaltyfish.fun/trans/v1/api/vip_agreement?locale=en)
This feature is exclusive to members. Please subscribe to use it~
Some input methods may not be supported. We apologize for the inconvenience~
This page is in a very early stage and is not intended for reference
No one till now, start inviting right now~
Remove this item from all corpus at the same time?
Modify this item in all corpus at the same time?
Currently editing, automatically paused for you
Will automatically pause after this part of the translation is completed~
%1$s term already exists, please edit directly
The current task is not completed yet. Are you sure you want to delete it?
This result is generated by Transtation App\'s Long Text Translation function, and the resulting content is for reference only
Create an article and start your journey of creation. Then press the translate button and witness the text gradually changing from beginning to end.
Select a text file to create a translation task with its content. Currently only pure text files are supported (PDF, Word documents, PPT, etc. are not supported yet)
Unfinished content will be placed here~
Please open this page with correct parameters
The source text of this translation task, currently recommended in plain text format
The result obtained by engine translation, which can ensure the consistency of context semantics to some extent

The target given to the model, you can specify the language and language style of the translation here. The latter part is the content that limits the output format and cannot be changed. Prompt can greatly affect the translation effect, please consider carefully. It is not recommended to input too long text, first it will increase the number of characters, second it will occupy the length of the main text content, which may affect the correlation between paragraphs

Terms refer to "proprietary words", such as specific place names, personal names, field nouns, etc. Adding custom terms can help the program complete the translation more accurately. "All corpus" refers to all terms that have appeared so far, and "current corpus" refers to the terms that may appear in the segment being translated.
Different models have different context lengths and different unit prices. The better the model, the higher the unit price. Please choose as needed.
The retry limit has been reached, and it is automatically paused
This small segment result parsing failed, waiting for longer output
The model processes text in token form, and the calculation here is the number of tokens
No historical tasks yet, try it first~
Swipe to delete, long press to modify remarks
The token count is an estimated value, calculated at 0.016/k
Until now, it seems that you have not used Transtation yet\nTry translation first, and then come back to see~

You are an excellent translator who is proficient in both Chinese and English. When I send English, you translate it into Chinese; when I send Chinese, you translate it into English. Your output should be accurate and appropriate, and you should be good at using sentence structures, rhetorical techniques, and professional vocabulary.\n\nNo matter what I input, unless you are asked to explain, you will always translate it
Please input a prompt related to foreign language learning and translation topics

Prompt specifies the task of the model, which can greatly affect the quality of translation. If there are special requirements (such as language, expression, professional field, etc.), it is recommended to specify,\n\nIt must be related to foreign language learning and translation, and judgment will be made during modification. Whether the judgment passes or not, the points used for judgment will be deducted. Please modify it carefully
You are now an excellent translator, working on translating a fragment of a long text. Please translate the input text into English according to the given terminology list.

Also, identify any potential new terminology. Your output consists of two parts, separated by ||sep||. The first part is the translation result, and the second part is the keywords in the form of a JSON array. If there are no keywords, it should be [].
Example input: XiaoHong and XiaoMing are studying DB class.||sep||[["DB","数据库"],["XiaoHong","萧红"]]
Example output: 萧红和晓明正在学习数据库课程||sep||[["XiaoMing","晓明"]]

Please maintain the format of the translated text consistent with the original text and correctly output all line breaks.
